name: Add \r
func:
msg.payload = Buffer.from(msg.payload + "\r");
return msg;

name: Random sensor data

func:
msg.payload=global.get('samples') || [];
return msg;

name: Generate gcode
Set Timestamp
func:
global.set("timestamp", msg.timestamp);
return null;

name: Append Samples to CSV file and graph
Set Sample
func:
global.set('sample', msg.payload);
return null;

name: Submit next gcode line when Idle
Reset SampleNumber and GUI
